root.add:
<columns name="Common_RunSql_Template"> <column name="GetRCLoginInfo"> <SqlQuery> SELECT em.EmployerID, em.AccountNum, em.SubAccount, eup.UserManagementID FROM JobsDBHK.dbo.EmpMast em WITH(NOLOCK) INNER JOIN JobsDBHK.dbo.Emp_UserManagement_Profile eup WITH(NOLOCK) ON em.EmployerID=eup.EmployerID AND eup.UserType=1 WHERE AccountNum=@AccountNum </SqlQuery> <SqlParam> AccountNum:730; EmployerId:100300085 </SqlParam> </column>
<column name="GetAdLoaderInfo"> <SqlQuery> SELECT em.EmployerID, em.AccountNum, em.SubAccount, eup.UserManagementID FROM JobsDBHK.dbo.EmpMast em WITH(NOLOCK) INNER JOIN JobsDBHK.dbo.Emp_UserManagement_Profile eup WITH(NOLOCK) ON em.EmployerID=eup.EmployerID AND eup.UserType=1 WHERE AccountNum=@AccountNum </SqlQuery> <SqlParam> AccountNum:730; EmployerId:100300085 </SqlParam> </column>
</columns>
<columns name="Common_GenCopyBat_Template"> <column name="To Local: Copy Web.Config"> <SourcePath>d$\jobsDBv8\JobsDB.Web\web.config</SourcePath> <TargetPath>{Env}_{CountryCode}\JobsDB.Web\%server%\</TargetPath> <BatType>1</BatType> </column> <column name="To Server: Copy Web.Config"> <SourcePath>d:\jobsDBv8\JobsDB.Web\web.config</SourcePath> <TargetPath>d$\jobsDBv8\JobsDB.Web\web.config</TargetPath> <BatType>2</BatType> </column>
<column name="To Local: Copy UnhandledEx.**.log"> <SourcePath>e$\Jobsdb\Log\{CountryCode}\%date%\UnhandledEx.%date%.log</SourcePath> <TargetPath>{Env}_{CountryCode}\Log\%server%\</TargetPath> <BatType>1</BatType> </column> <column name="To Local: Copy Web PaymentGateway.**.log"> <SourcePath>e$\Jobsdb\Log\{CountryCode}\%date%\PaymentGateway.%date%.log</SourcePath> <TargetPath>{Env}_{CountryCode}\Log\%server%\</TargetPath> <BatType>1</BatType> </column> <column name="To Local: Copy Nginx PaymentGateway.**.log"> <SourcePath>/var/log/nginx/paymentgateway.access.log</SourcePath> <TargetPath>{Env}_{CountryCode}\Nginx\%server%\</TargetPath> <BatType>3</BatType> </column>
<column name="To Local: Copy FileSystemProperty.Config"> <SourcePath>d$\jobsDBv8\JobsDB.Web\Config\FileSystemProperty.config</SourcePath> <TargetPath>{Env}_{CountryCode}\JobsDB.Web\%server%\</TargetPath> <BatType>1</BatType> </column> </columns>
